DescriptionData.Title: Bad Ass Mini Stencils Expansion Set - 36 designs (BAMS 2001 - 2036)
DescriptionData.Description: Bad Ass Mini Stencils Expansion Set includes 36 newer stencil designs, which provides face paint artists with a wide selection of trendy design options to choose from.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Thin, flexible Mylar stencils perfect for face and body painting
Work great to create intricate face paint details with a brush, sponge or airbrush
Set includes 5" x 3.5" oval shaped mini stencils in 36 original Bad Ass Designs - BAMS 2001-2036
Can be easily stored in a chain (included in the set)
